name: The Lich & The Lordling
description:
The Lich and the Lordling is an SRPG taking inspiration from games like Fire Emblem, Tactics Ogre and Final Fantasy Tactics. It tells the story of a Lich who teams up with a Prince wanting to take back his throne... even though they were at each other's throats just a day ago. Lead this unlikely alliance to victory in this lighthearted adventure!

♛♛♛

The demo is in early alpha- balancing may be off, bugs may be encountered and content is definitely lacking. It's only the first third of the story. (It's meant to be a short game.)

If you decide to check it out, I'd love to hear your feedback, whether it be negative of positive!
